titleStmt.title: The victory of death, or, The fall of beauty a visionary Pindarick-poem, occasion'd by the ever to be deplor'd death of the Right Honourable the Lady Cutts / by Mr. John Hopkins.
titleStmt.author: Hopkins, John, fl. 1700.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by B.M. and are to be sold by Sam. Buckley ... and Rich. Wellington ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Harvard University Libraries.
